longBusinessSummary.0: Anupam Rasayan India Ltd engages in the custom synthesis and manufacturing of specialty chemicals in India. The company offers life science related specialty chemicals, such as agro intermediates and agro active ingredients for the agrochemicals industry; anti-bacterial and ultra violet protection intermediates and ingredients for the personal care industry; and intermediates and key starting materials for active pharmaceutical ingredients. It also provides other specialty chemicals used in various end-user segments, including specialty pigments, specialty dyes, and polymer additives. In addition, the company exports its products. Anupam Rasayan India Ltd was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Surat, India.
